title: PlayerSQL问题，插件无法加载
author: Meteor___
txt_content:
插件地址
1.12spigot
插件版本是git上最新的
报错
[18:28:58 ERROR]: Could not load 'plugins\playersql-2.10-SNAPSHOT-all.jar' in folder 'plugins'
org.bukkit.plugin.InvalidPluginException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/mengcraft/simpleorm/lib/Library
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.loadPlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:133) ~[spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1602.jar:git-Spigot-4bd94dc-bacaf92]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.loadPlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:327) ~[spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1602.jar:git-Spigot-4bd94dc-bacaf92]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.loadPlugins(SimplePluginManager.java:248) [spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1602.jar:git-Spigot-4bd94dc-bacaf92]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.CraftServer.loadPlugins(CraftServer.java:305) [spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1602.jar:git-Spigot-4bd94dc-bacaf92]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:205) [spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1602.jar:git-Spigot-4bd94dc-bacaf92]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:545) [spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1602.jar:git-Spigot-4bd94dc-bacaf92]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_231]
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/mengcraft/simpleorm/lib/Library
        at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_231]
        at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_231]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.PluginClassLoader.<init>(PluginClassLoader.java:78) ~[spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1602.jar:git-Spigot-4bd94dc-bacaf92]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.loadPlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:129) ~[spigot-1.12.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT-b1602.jar:git-Spigot-4bd94dc-bacaf92]
        ... 6 more复制代码

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
1594425141 发表于 2020-4-19 18:51
还是有问题，这是报错,麻烦你看看
这个是我从playersql里面找到的下载地址
http://ci.mengcraft.com:8081/job ... rm-1.2-SNAPSHOT.jar
你用这个取代掉我上面给你的网站下载到的simpleorm试试

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content: 是不是有前置插件没装啊

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
读取不了插件的plugins.yml
退回版本呢？

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content:
是不是你更新了版本，影响数据库了（清一下？）
降低一下版本试试

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
基本上可以确认是这个问题
softdepend: [SimpleORM, ProtocolLib]
虽然写了softdepend
但是估计作者在某个地方强行引用了别的插件的类
所以引发了NoClassDefFoundError异常

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
1594425141 发表于 2020-4-19 18:51
还是有问题，这是报错,麻烦你看看
这个插件好像用的时候会从远程仓库拖一堆运行库下来
可能是你的网络环境不太好，也有可能是网站运营跑路了
本地机器的话挂一下代理试试
